segments.text: Good . I'll take care of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a second , Vince . You know what ? Why don't you let me handle it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure ? Do you have somebody in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . Let me see if he'll do it , and I'll get back to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Just keep in mind it has to be somebody who can get along with Elvin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't sweat it . I know just the guy .
segments.speaker: S1
